/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/chapter01.dir/scenebasic.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter01.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter01.dir/scenebasic_uniformblock.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter01.dir/scenebasic_attrib.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter01.dir/scenebasic_uniform.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter01.dir/scenebasic_debug.cpp.o  -o chapter01 -rdynamic ../ingredients/libingredients.a /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lGL -lpthread -lXrandr -lXxf86vm -lXi -lrt
